ComicInfo.Summary: In this thrilling adventure, Oliver, a brave and resourceful hero, joins forces with Big Bo and Little Bo to safeguard their beloved countryside barn, which is home to a menagerie of former circus animals. The barn, nestled in the heart of the countryside, has become a sanctuary for these majestic creatures, who were once part of a traveling circus. However, their peaceful existence is disrupted when a group of ruthless bandits sets their sights on the barn, seeking to exploit the animals for their own gain.
